恑字的基本解释

恑
guǐ
变异：“恢恑憰怪。”
反悔。
独立的样子。

恑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǐ］
［《廣韻》過委切，上紙，見。］
变诈，诡变。
[②]［wéi］
［《集韻》虞爲切，平支，疑。］
独立貌。

恑字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　恑； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页384第12
【唐韻】過委切【集韻】古委切，?音詭。【說文】變也。【玉篇】異也。【廣韻】悔也。　又【集韻】虞爲切，音危。獨立貌。◎按《說文》恑字从心，與詭字从言音同義別。字彙同詭，誤。

恑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
恑字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǐ］
["Guangyun" has been cut, put on paper, see you. ]
Be deceitful, treacherous.
[②]［wéi］
["Jiyun" Yu Weiqi, flat support, doubt. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　恑; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 384 to 12
[Tang Yun] Gu Weiqie [Jiyun] Ancient Weiqie, sound tricky. [Said Wen] Change also. 【Jade articles】Also different. [Guang Yun] Regret too.　[Jiyun] Yu is cut, the sound is dangerous. Independent appearance. ◎According to "Shuowen", pressing the word from the heart is synonymous with the tricky word from the sound. The vocabulary is the same, wrong.
